Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

setInitialStates(

About Us

GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry with products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories.

Read more




That which resonates with your life

“Upgrade Your Life” is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today.

When ideas manifest into reality

We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity.

Foretelling your future in tech

Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

Read more

Product Description

8GB RAM 256GB SSD

8GB LPDDR4X memory, 256GB SSD high-speed storage lets you use very smoothly in daily work. What’s more, GemiBook supports Sata protocal 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB, realizing massive space.

2K Resolution IPS Screen

13in 2K resolution IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear, 3:2 The aspect ratio of the screen, can expand the vertical space of the screen, and can display more content.

it has a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency.

Backlit Keyboard & Narrow Bezel

Chuwi GemiBook windows laptop houses a narrow-bezel 13”FHD IPS , Features a backlit keyboard which makes you work comfortably in dark environment.

Ultra-light and Ultra-thin

The body of this traditional Laptop computers is made of light alloy and weighs only 2.95 pounds. Sharing and callaborating is even easier with 180° hinge and 170° wide viewing angle.

High Speed Wireless Connection

CHUWI GemiBook laptop computer Intel Wireless-AC 7265 Wireless module supports 2.4G /5G dual-bandandthe top speed can reach 867Mbps, providing a more smooth Wireless network experience.

this windows 10 laptop adopts 38Wh high-capacity lithiumion battery, battery life up to 8 hours, which is enough for a whole day’s use. support upgrade to Windows 11 Home .

【High Performance Processor】- CHUWI GemiBook windows laptop powered by Intel Celeron J4125 processor, frequency up to 2.7GHz, 4 cores 4 threads, powerful operation without lagging make your device runs smoothly for daliy work and entertainment, preferred for business office or student. support upgrade to windows 11.
【13in 2K resolution IPS Display 】- GemiBook 13 inch laptop computer with 2K resolution FHD IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear. 3:2 The aspect ratio can expand the vertical space of the screen which can display more content, bring you a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency when browsing web pages or documents.
【Large Capacity Storage】- This Win 10 Laptop with 8GB RAM(LPDDR4X), 256GB high-speed SSD, let you use smoothly without stuck even with multiple programs opened. supports NVMe 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB and TF card expansion to 512GB, realizing massive space for most complex software run efficient.
【Premium Portable Design】- This traditional Laptop computer made of magnesium-alloy weighs only 2.82 pounds, has excellent portability. Adopts 180°hinge makes sharing and ollaborating much easier. Equipped with a full size backlit keyboard and large trackpad, which provide a more convenient typing experience and ensuring visibility even in the dark.
【Longer Battery Life】- GemiBook home laptop pc adopts 38Wh lithium-ion battery which life up to 8H enough for daliy use. Equipped with full function USB-C, supports video or data transmission and PD2.0 fast charging. In addition, there are many interfaces such as USB-A 3.0*1，3.5mm headphone jack, M.2 SSD extension, Micro-SD, etc.

Acer Aspire C24-1650-UA92 All-in-One Desktop PC comes with these specs: 11th Generation Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor 2.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 4.2GHz (8MB Smart Cache), Windows 11 Home, 23.8″ Full HD Widescreen Edge-to-Edge LED Back-lit IPS Display, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, 8GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones, Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet, Bluetooth 5.0, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, 1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear), 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear), 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle), 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear), 1 – Ethernet RJ-45 Port, Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, 15.43 lbs. | 6.99 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DQ.BFSAA.001)
Breaking the boundaries of performance with the Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor – up to 4.20 GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads, 8 MB Intel Smart Cache | Intel Iris Xe Graphics
23.8″ Full HD Widescreen IPS LED Back-lit Screen | 8GB 3200MHz DDR4 Memory | 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD
Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology | Bluetooth 5.0 | 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN
1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear) | 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear) | 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle) | 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear)
Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones | Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Included | Windows 11 Home

A Modern Design for the Modern World

The Aspire C24 All-in-One PC packs all the essential computing features you need into a slim, space-saving design that’s simple to use, functional and looks great on your desk. This PC features the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, Intel Iris Xe graphic and fast Wi-Fi 6 connectivity for an awesome computing experience. Enjoy a crisp and clear experience on the 23.8″ Full HD display while the impressively thin bezels give you more to look at. (Wireless Keyboard and Mouse included)

Previous page

  2. Borderless Design

    The 23.8” Full FHD borderless display let you experience clearer images and vibrant entertainment.

  3. Stand Thin, Stand Tall

    The ultrathin design saves on space and gives any room an extra touch of elegance.

Next page

1 11th Gen Intel Core i5 2 23.8″ FHD Display 3 Ultra-Thin Design

Glorious Display

See more details and sharper colors on the FHD display. With a 0.14″ narrow bezel and a screen-to-body ratio of up to 88% you get to see more of the screen at viewing angles of 178°.

Plenty of Storage

Videos, photos, music, games and applications all take up a lot of storage space but users won’t need to fear it filling up. With 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD and 8GB DDR4 Ram there’s lots of storage.

Privacy is Key

The Webcam at the top of Aspire C24 has a camera shutter that you can easily open and shut by sliding it with your finger for safeguarding your privacy when the webcam is not in use.

Ready to Assist

Effortlessly interact with Cortana while the device is in Modern Standby mode and enjoy crystal-clear audio with DTS: X audio. You can also further streamline your smart environment with Alexa to truly make your home run as smoother than ever before imagined.

4.5

Price: $189.00 - $168.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Built for Students

Designed for K-12 students, the ASUS BR1100 is the good learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain. If the battery charge drops 20% or the notebook loses connectivity, the LED indicator lights up alerting teachers that students need help.

Serviceability

Servicing laptops for education can be a lengthy process with costly fixes and slow turnaround time for school operations. The ASUS BR1100 is built in a modular design with retained screws to mitigate lost time and equipment pieces. Its military-grade durability will help battle against daily rigors that can occur inside and outside of class.

Flexible network support

Make the IT team’s job simpler with Windows Autopilot, a service provided by Microsoft to help set up devices remotely without needing to physically handle the laptops. All devices can be configured remotely so students can stay engaged without class time interruptions.

Distance learning

Designed with the latest performance features including a noise reduction camera with a security shield and an AI noise cancelling microphone, the BR1100 helps reduce distractions. With a wide array of connectivity, including optional LTE, can easily integrate into any learning space.

Processor: Intel Celeron N4500 1.1GHz Dual-Core Processor (4MB Cache, Up to 2.8GHz)

Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Memory: 4GB DDR4 SDRAM

Hard Drive: Up to 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive + 128GB eMMC

Optical Drive: No

Display: 11.6″ HD LED Backlit Display, Eye Care certified by TÜV Rheinland

Connectivity: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity

Audio: 2 x 1.5W Speakers, AI Noise-canceling Audio Technology

Keyboard: US English, Non-Backlit Full Size Keyboard

Built-in HD Webcam: 720P Camera with Privacy Shutter and Dual Array Microphones

Media Drive: Multi-format SD media card reader

Ports:

1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with a power delivery support2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A1 x AC smart pin1 x HDMI1 x Headphone / Mic Combo Jack1 x RJ-45 Ethernet Port

Battery: Up to 14 Hours

Color: Almond

Dimensions L x W x H (inches): 11.6 x 8.1 x 0.8

Weight: 2.8 lbs

【Storage & RAM】Enjoy up to 15x faster performance than a traditional hard drive with 128 GB storage and experience improved multitasking with higher bandwidth thanks to 4 GB of RAM
【Built for Students】Designed for K-12 students, the BR1100 is the perfect learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain.
【US Military-grade Standard】Build to withstand everyday knowks, bumps, drops and spills without damage. So, whether it’s dropped from a classroom desk or the dining table, it’s build to keep on going.
【Child Centered Design】Its child centered design features webcam privacy shield, germproof keyboard and TÜV certified display to protect eyes.
【Operating System】Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Read more
